ygData.subject: Why are instanced created?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I created my own Processor to write to my own archive. Every time I start Heritrix 1.12, the log file shows it is creating a new instance of this Processor

Hi,

I created my own Processor to write to my own archive.

Every time I s=
tart Heritrix 1.12, the log file shows it is creating a
new instance of thi=
s Processor for every past completed job. So if I
had previously completely=
 500 jobs. Then I see 500 entries in the log
that this class was created.

=
We is this happening? My Processor class performs initializing
operations (=
loading properties, reading XML files). So this seems like
a waste of CPU t=
ime.

What happens to all those instances? Are they destroyed, or do they
s=
tay in memory?
